questions.question: I was late because my car ……………… on the way to work.
questions.description: When something breaks down, it stops functioning.

questions.question: She ………………………. with her best friend when he lied to her.
questions.description: To break up with somebody is to end your relationship with them.

questions.question: The girl ………………………. when she heard that she had failed.
questions.description: To break down is to lose control of your emotions.

questions.question: The warden …………………….. our conversation.
questions.description: To break in on is to interrupt.

questions.question: Cholera …………………… after the floods.
questions.description: When a disease breaks out, it appears and spreads suddenly.

questions.question: A dangerous prisoner ………………………. the high security prison yesterday.
questions.description: To break out of jail is to escape from captivity.

questions.question: Please …………………….. your coat. It is very cold.
questions.description: To put on coat is to wear it.

questions.question: Would you mind if I ……………………. TV? I would like to watch the match.
Excuse me. Where can I …………………….. the shirt?
questions.description: To try on a shirt is to try wearing it to see if it fits you.

questions.question: If you don’t …………………….. the train now, it will leave without you.
questions.description: To get on the train is to board it.

questions.question: Can I ……………………… working now?
questions.description: To carry on something is to continue doing it.

questions.question: You must …………………….. smoking.
questions.description: To give up smoking is to quit it.
